description:
Julian is a 27-year-old straight stud from Australia. He grew up in a small beach town and when he turned 18 he moved to Sydney to experience big city life.
That's where he met an American girl who was there on business. When she returned to the states, he came with her, only to have them break up a year later. Classic love story.
That was five years ago. Fortunately he was able to stay and he's been here working construction ever since.
There are a lot of Australians here in southern California and the thing that seems constant among all those I've met is how happy and polite they are.
Julian was one big smile as he answered all of our questions, and his responses were peppered with a lot of "thumbs up."
Julian is beefy and hairy, but trimmed. The first thing that caught my eye was his big, fat, juicy cock.
He seemed to really enjoy himself.
"I've never had this much attention from anyone in my life," he said. "I'm never going back to Australia!"
title: Julian
